mil7.5.1:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘upacikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.1:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, upacikā upari chadanaṃ katvā attānaṃ pidahitvā gocarāya carati;
mil7.5.1:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sīlasaṃvarachadanaṃ katvā mānasaṃ pidahitvā piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ, sīlasaṃvarachadanena kho, mahārāja, yogī yogāvacaro sabbabhayasamatikkanto hoti.
mil7.5.1:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, upacikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
